Title: Hackathon. DotNetNuke Razor. Flickr Badge
Description: Flickr badge desktop module allows you to display image thumbnails from Flickr and preview them inside DotNetNuke or on Flickr (controlled by module settings). Image thumbnails can be loaded by tag, user id, user group id, user set id and more.
HomeWiki:
Flickr badge desktop module allows you to display image thumbnails from Flickr and preview them inside DotNetNuke or on Flickr (controlled by module settings). Image thumbnails can be loaded by tag, user id, user group id, user set id and more. This desktop module has a very nice UI controlled by CSS, so you can use it out of the box or customize for your needs. This module also contains Razor Helper to load images from Flickr. This helper can be reused in other Razor modules inside DNN.

Demos: Flick Badge Demo #1 Flick Badge Demo #2


Module Screenshot


Module Settings Screenshot

 

Requirements
1. DonNetNuke 5.0.6 running on .NET Framework 4.0
2. DotNetNuke Razor Host Module - http://www.dotnetnuke.com/Portals/25/Hackathon/Razor/DNNCorp.RazorHost_01.00.00_Install.zip
